Hello

I am a researcher at I&C Lab, attlanTTic research center, University of Vigo.

I am currently finishing a PhD in Information and Communication Technologies in University of Vigo. During my PhD, I was a visiting researcher in SAMOVAR Lab, Télécom SudParis.
Before, I received the Telecommunications Engineer degree (BSc + MSc) from the University of Vigo in 2014. I was also a Erasmus student at the University of Oulu (Finland), where I completed my Master Thesis at the Oulu University Secure Programming Group.

I work on information technologies for smart cities, including participatory sensing, sensors, data analysis, ubiquitous computing.
